Open Collective | https://opencollective.com | New York City | ONSITE

Open Collective allows unincorporated communities (like Open Source projects, meetups, etc) to raise and spend money. You can charge membership fees, get donations from individuals or companies and spend it by filing expenses. The entire financial ledger is publicly viewable to ensure transparency. Some examples: opencollective.com/webpack, opencollective.com/babel, and many more opencollective.com/opensource.

We are a founding team of 3 (two engineers) and are looking to hire our first full-time engineer (https://medium.com/open-collective/open-collective-is-hiring...).

Send me a note at aseem@opencollective.com with your GitHub, LinkedIn, resume, etc.
